text: Alejandro Falla was the defending champion but did not compete this year. Santiago Giraldo won in the final 6–3, 6–3 against Paolo Lorenzi. ==Seeds== ==Draw== ===Finals=== ===Top Half=== ===Bottom Half=== ==References== *Qualifying Singles *Main Draw Seguros Bolivar Open Pereira - Singles 2010 Singles
